1.content: A wand sits on the side of a road. The wind blows and footsteps are heard.
1.title: A wand finds its user.

11.content: A college student finds the wand. The college student looks around and witnesses two kids standing beside one another. A boy and girl of equal height, and the boy was trying to take something away from the girl. It looked like a stuffed animal of some sort. He points the wand at the girl wishing that she was taller.
11.title: College Student Male

info.brief_description: A magic wand that does exactly what the user says "Plus", or the opposite "Minus".
info.description:
A person finds a wand that does exactly what the user says, or the complete opposite. The wand isn't spontaneous, It will either always be in a plus mode in universe, and minus mode in the other. The wand can only work if there is an opposite to the desired out come. I would like to make it so that every story in one universe has a parallel in the other universe.

The Plus universe will have the character continue as the true intentions are.

The minus universe will continue as though the consequences of the wand was what the user wanted.

I am going to begin with one male character as the protagonist, but will add more later.
